response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am excited to present our premium product, which I believe would greatly benefit you. Given its value to you, we propose a price of $11,500 for the product. This price reflects not only the cost and quality but also allows us to ensure a fair profit. We are confident that this investment will pay off handsomely for you. Please let us know if you have any questions or need further information. We look forward to the possibility of working with you.", "product_price": 11500}
